dcterms:description: A newly published real-world object dataset with approximately 15k objects in 15 categories, designed to evaluate the performance and robustness of point cloud classification methods.
dcterms:title: ScanObjectNN

dcterms:creator: Z. Wu

dcterms:description: A synthetic point cloud dataset sampled from CAD models, comprising 9832 training objects and 2468 test objects in 40 classes, known for its clean shapes and well-constructed data.
dcterms:title: ModelNet40
